title: Applicability
context: ยง508D-2 Applicability. Except as otherwise provided for in this chapter, this chapter applies to any sale of residential real property. The failure of the seller or the seller&rsquo;s agent to comply with this chapter shall not affect the validity of title to any residential real property sold.
